items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LVSS Mongolian Cashmere Sweater, Lhasa in L
items.body: I’m very glad to have ordered this sweater. I tested it out in a snowstorm and it kept me very toasty. I was noticeably cooler when I took it off. I ordered up because sometimes when it’s looser, it seems to be warmer or maybe that’s just me. But the fabric is very nice, the color is similar to a dark beige-tan. It is not very thick, which is great because it’s still warm, but you can layer if so desired. The sweaters are true to size Read more
items.author: Amazon Username

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and super soft cashmere sweater
items.body: I got this beautiful cashmere crewneck sweater for my wife and I will say I probably should've waited for Christmas or Thanksgiving to gifted to her because it is such a beautiful gift. It feels super soft and comfortable around the body and neck and arms and my wife is relatively sensitive when it comes to fabrics, touching her skin and she has no issues with this whatsoever. Cashmere in general is always going to be a little more expensive, but it is a pure delight to wear and it actually is comfortable cozy and warm while also not making you sweat because it's very breathable. In general, natural fibers like wool cashmere and other animal hairs are fantastic sweater products to be wearing. There are so many health benefits to wearing cashmere and this in fact is 100% cashmere that's imported. I love it and I love the way my wife looks in it. Read more
items.author: Aver

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luxuriously Soft and Surprisingly Versatile
items.body: This sweater instantly became one of the most cherished pieces in the wardrobe. The feel of 100% pure cashmere is exactly what you hope for—soft, lightweight, and cozy without being bulky. It’s warm enough for chilly mornings but breathable enough to stay comfortable indoors. The crewneck cut is timeless and flattering, making it easy to dress up or down. It pairs just as effortlessly with jeans for a relaxed look as it does layered over a blouse for work or dinner. The sleeves and hem hold their shape well, and the stitching is clean and even throughout. After several wears, it still looks fresh with no signs of pilling or stretching, especially with gentle care. It’s clear this is a high-quality cashmere piece that feels like a quiet luxury—refined, elegant, and made to last. Read more
items.author: Weldon Family

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Luxurious look/feel
items.body: This cashmere sweater feels incredibly soft right out of the box. (And it actually arrived wrapped in a nice gift box!) The sweater is light, cozy, and definitely a step up from standard wool blends. The “Lhasa” color is subtle and elegant and the sweater drapes beautifully without clinging. I like these kind of sweaters - they can be worn casually or dressed up for a more polished look. I hope it holds up over time with the upkeep - that remains to be seen. Update: It has a smell. I don’t know if it’s normal or unusual, but I’d describe it as chemical, maybe oily. I do not find it pleasant or very ignorable. Read more
items.author: BlakSaigon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cozy and fits well
items.body: I’ll start by admitting I have absolutely no idea how to tell if something is actually pure cashmere or not. So I’ll write this review in good faith, assuming that the material is actually as advertised. Overall, it’s a very nice, classic sweater. It fits well and the color is as expected. I did think that it would have been softer, but it has a bit of scratchiness to the texture that I wasn’t expecting. Hopefully that softens with wear. There’s also a random button on the side that I am not a fan of, considering that there are no other buttons on the sweater. I’m assuming it’s purely for decorative or branding purposes, but since it’s too small to read the letters and KVSS is not a well known brand, I don’t see the point. And from a distance it looks like a flaw on the sweater. I would cut it off, but I’m a bit afraid of damaging the fabric. Overall, it’s a nice, cozy sweater. I do think it is overpriced for what it is, but I will definitely wear it a lot this winter. Read more
items.author: Hannah Kaye

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Cozy, and Effortlessly Chic
items.body: This cashmere sweater is absolutely beautiful! It arrived in the most elegant packaging , the box itself was so pretty and made the unboxing experience feel really special. The sweater is incredibly soft to the touch, with that luxurious, lightweight feel that only real cashmere has. The fit is perfect , flattering without being too snug , and it drapes beautifully. The color is soft and neutral, making it ideal for fall and easy to pair with just about anything in my wardrobe. It’s one of those timeless pieces that looks effortlessly chic whether you dress it up or down. Overall, I’m beyond happy with this purchase. The quality, presentation, and comfort are all outstanding. I’ll definitely be ordering more in other colors , this has quickly become one of my favorite sweaters! Read more
items.author: Mtlmama

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Cashmere Sweater!
items.body: This cashmere sweater is gorgeous! It is of very high quality and value. It is so soft and comfortable to wear. It never goes out of style either. I got the beige so it will go with a lot of my skirts and the color is so very beautiful. The sweater itself is not too heavy but it will definitely keep me warm. I wear a size small and the small fit me perfectly so it is true to size. I very highly recommend!!! Read more
items.author: Kat Tolle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, thick quality cashmere
items.body: This cashmere top came beautifully packaged, an extra strand of the yarn to test its authenticity as well as a QR code to trace the source of the wool. I’ve never heard of this brand before, but the sweater is nice and thick and is quite soft as you would expect out of quality cashmere. I sized up one from my normal size for a bit of an oversized look and the fit is perfect. Hopefully it holds up well through use but I’m excited to wear this during winter! Read more
items.author: Average Family

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Otter, Vermillion, Drizzle, Black, Latte, Lhasa, Negligee, Slate, Blue Rinse. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
